ARE_YOU_SURE: Are you sure you want to remove Project ? The action is not reversible!
SET_PROJECT_DEADLINE: Please set the project deadline first
SOLUTION_DEADLINE: Solution deadline (must be before or equal to the opportunity deadline)
SET_OPPORTUNITY_DEADLINE: Please set the opportunity deadline first
YOU_CANT_CHANGE: You can't change the team of a project from the statistics view
DISCARD_PROJECT: Are you sure you want to discard Create Project ?
NAME_LENGTH: Name must be between 3 and 20 characters
DESCRIPTION_LENGTH: Description must be between 3 and 20 characters
PROJECT_DEADLINE_FOR_OPPOPTUNITY_SOLUTIO: Project deadline (sets the deadline for all opportunities and solutions as well)
SELECT_TEAM_FOR_OPPORTUNITIES: Select a team to see the opportunities
OPPURTUNITY_DEADLINE: Opportunity deadline (sets the deadline for all the corresponding solutions as well)
